Package: com.github.jrubygradle.internal

[Groovy] Trait JRubyExecTraits

    • com.github.jrubygradle.internal.JRubyExecTraits

    • Provides common traits for JRuby script execution across the JRubyExec task and {@project.jrubyexec} extension.

      Authors:
      Schalk W. Cronj√©
      Since:
      0.1.18

      • Property Detail

        • boolean inheritRubyEnv

          Allow JRubyExec to inherit a Ruby env from the shell (e.g. RVM)

          Since:
          0.1.10 (Moved from JRubyExec)

          Add arguments for jruby

          Parameters:
          args - Additional arguments to be passed to JRuby itself.

        • void script(java.lang.Object scr)

          Set script to execute.

          Parameters:
          scr - Path to script. Can be any object that is convertible to File.

          Add arguments for script

          Parameters:
          args - Arguments to be aqdded to script arguments
